Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens (JJ)
Creation date: 06.07.2001
14.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)

filter administration mandatory
17.12.2008 SH SCR14217 Send v.Administration to OSP004E
11.12.2008 GB SCR14217 Added next filter the Administration
03.08.2005 AK SCR8456 Added combobox for exclude/Include corrections
01.04.2004 EE SCR#5691 corrected totals
12.03.2004 EE SCR#5691 changed option include corrections
21.01.2004 MW -> SCR5144 Changed the numeric picture (columns 3,5,7) in 9C
14.01.2004 JJ SC5214 added option include corections
09.12.2003 JJ SCR4949 call of browse task from RM (click in table) only backward

-New buttons Unconfirmed/Monthly totals
20.05.2003 JJ SCR3194 new button handling

18.10.2001 JJ SCR#88 removed SCHT_ENTRYFINISHED='Y' from where clause
C: Cancel, Exit
S: Ok/Select, View Selected Day, return Online when done
OSP004B Sets Mouse to normal in TS, so set to busy again here
U: Unconfirmed
T: MonthlyTotals

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OSP004A]: Selected month: Totals of each day')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT MAX(SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV) , cast(SUM( SCHT_TOTADEBTNOTESH) as decimal(18,2)), cast(SUM (SCHT_TOTNDEBTNOTES) as decimal(18)), cast( SUM (SCHT_TOTACREDNOTESH) as decimal (18,2)), cast( SUM (SCHT_TOTNCREDNOTES) as decimal(18)), cast(SUM (SCHT_TOTADEBTNOTESH - SCHT_TOTACREDNOTESH) as decimal (18,2)), cast(count(SCHT_NO) as decimal(18)) FROM :1/SCHT WHERE SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV BETWEEN ':2' AND ':3' :4 :5 :6 GROUP BY SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV ORDER BY 1

SELECT cast(sum( SCHT_TOTADEBTNOTESH) as decimal (18,2)), cast(sum(SCHT_TOTNDEBTNOTES) as decimal (18,2)), cast(sum(SCHT_TOTACREDNOTESH) as decimal (18,2)), cast(sum( SCHT_TOTNCREDNOTES) as decimal (18,2)), count(*) FROM :1/scht WHERE SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV BETWEEN ':2' and ':3' :4 :5 :6
